    BotBuddy
    BotBuddy is a simple wrapper around java.awt.Robot.
    BotBuddy.Builder
    BotBuddy.Builder constructs a BotBuddy using the Builder Design Pattern.
    BotBuddy.Shortcut
    This class can really be used for any automated operations, not just keyboard shortcuts.
